name: BOOMER Alpha
description:
BOOMER ALPHA  Heyo!

Thanks for checking out the Boomer Alpha Test. Thanks for the support and help in making Boomer a better experience before launch. This is very much an Alpha Build, its missing a couple of components and features, but it is still playable and offers you a preview of the gameplay and game feel.

As updates become available, you will be notified via email and new versions will be hosted here for you to download at your convenience.

Please consider providing feedback regarding your experience in the community discussion board.

  • How was was Boomer's movement?(too fast, slow, just right)
  • How is the pace of the game?
  • How was the environment?
  • Do you see yourself wanting to play additional levels?
  • What would you like to see added or changed?

Thanks!

North Game Studio
